languages.text: "Сегодня великий и древний враг пал по воле Его. Восхвалим Неумирающего за то, что сделал нас исполнителями сей почетной миссии".
"On this day, an ancient and terrible foe fell, as was His will. Let us thank the Undying Emperor for choosing us for this great mission."
languages.original_text: "Сегодня великий и древний враг пал по воле Его. Восхвалим Неумирающего за то, что сделал нас исполнителями сей почетной миссии".

traits.locale_text: "On this day, an ancient and terrible foe fell, as was His will. Let us thank the Undying Emperor for choosing us for this great mission."
"On this day, an ancient and terrible foe fell, as was His will. Let us thank the Undying Emperor for choosing us for this great mission."
"On this day, an ancient and terrible foe fell, as was His will. Let us thank the Undying Emperor for choosing us for this great mission."
"On this day, an ancient and terrible foe fell, as was His will. Let us thank the Undying Emperor for choosing us for this great mission."
"On this day, an ancient and terrible foe fell, as was His will. Let us thank the Undying Emperor for choosing us for this great mission."
"On this day, an ancient and terrible foe fell, as was His will. Let us thank the Undying Emperor for choosing us for this great mission."

languages.text: «En este día, ha caído un enemigo ancestral y terrible, de acuerdo con Su voluntad. Agradezcamos al Emperador Inmortal que nos haya elegido para esta gran misión».
languages.original_text: "On this day, an ancient and terrible foe fell, as was His will. Let us thank the Undying Emperor for choosing us for this great mission."

traits.locale_text: «En este día, ha caído un enemigo ancestral y terrible, de acuerdo con Su voluntad. Agradezcamos al Emperador Inmortal que nos haya elegido para esta gran misión».

languages.text: 「その日、古代の恐ろしい敵が、御心のままに倒れました。この偉大な使命のために我々を選んでくださった不死の皇帝に感謝しましょう」
languages.original_text: "On this day, an ancient and terrible foe fell, as was His will. Let us thank the Undying Emperor for choosing us for this great mission."

traits.locale_text: 「その日、古代の恐ろしい敵が、御心のままに倒れました。この偉大な使命のために我々を選んでくださった不死の皇帝に感謝しましょう」

languages.text: “此时此刻，一位古老而可怕的敌人倒下了，这是祂的旨意。让我们感谢不死神皇，感谢祂选择我们完成了这项伟大的使命。”
languages.original_text: "On this day, an ancient and terrible foe fell, as was His will. Let us thank the Undying Emperor for choosing us for this great mission."

traits.locale_text: “此时此刻，一位古老而可怕的敌人倒下了，这是祂的旨意。让我们感谢不死神皇，感谢祂选择我们完成了这项伟大的使命。”

languages.text: "An diesem Tag fiel ein alter und schrecklicher Gegner, weil Er es wollte. Danken wir dem Todlosen Imperator, dass er uns für diese große Mission auserwählt hat."
languages.original_text: "On this day, an ancient and terrible foe fell, as was His will. Let us thank the Undying Emperor for choosing us for this great mission."

traits.locale_text: "An diesem Tag fiel ein alter und schrecklicher Gegner, weil Er es wollte. Danken wir dem Todlosen Imperator, dass er uns für diese große Mission auserwählt hat."

languages.text: « En ce jour de grâce, un adversaire aussi ancien que redoutable est tombé et Sa volonté a été faite. Rendons grâce à l'Empereur Immortel de nous avoir confié cette mission sacrée. »
languages.original_text: "On this day, an ancient and terrible foe fell, as was His will. Let us thank the Undying Emperor for choosing us for this great mission."

traits.locale_text: « En ce jour de grâce, un adversaire aussi ancien que redoutable est tombé et Sa volonté a été faite. Rendons grâce à l'Empereur Immortel de nous avoir confié cette mission sacrée. »

languages.text: "Tam bugün, tıpkı İmparator'un arzuladığı gibi dehşet dolu bir kadim düşman yok edildi. Bu muazzam misyonda bizi seçtiği için Ölmeyen İmparator'a minnettarlığımızı sunalım."
languages.original_text: "On this day, an ancient and terrible foe fell, as was His will. Let us thank the Undying Emperor for choosing us for this great mission."
